name: Solano County Crisis Line
description: Solano County's 24-hour crisis line provides immediate mental health support and crisis intervention for county residents.
fullDescription: Solano County's 24-hour crisis line provides immediate mental health support and crisis intervention for county residents.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 crisis phone support
- Mental health crisis intervention
- Suicide prevention
- Referrals to county services
- Connection to mobile crisis teams
howToGetIt: Call 707-428-1131 anytime for crisis support. Free and confidential for Solano County residents.
keywords: Solano County, crisis line, mental health crisis, suicide prevention, mobile crisis team
